snippet: In most of the closest congressional races, the two candidates are far apart ideologically.
abstract: David Leonhardt The Upshot column; Crowdpac online service uses voting history as well as donor information to rank members of Congress and candidates on liberal to conservative scale; chart shows ideological gaps between candidates in each Senate race for 2014 midterm elections.
lead_paragraph: In most of the closest congressional races, the two candidates are far apart ideologically.

headline.main: The New Political Rating System That Shows the Stakes This Year
headline.print_headline: New Rating System Charts Nation’s Partisan Chasms
